scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker leverages a series of carefully crafted queries to the model, gradually inferring private customer information such as income levels and purchase history.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A financial institution uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn and proactively mitigate risks. The model is exposed via a REST API for internal use and potential integration with other systems.
